name: forked
content:

with one end divided into two parts: a forked tail a snake's forked tongue a forked tree branch forked lightning Opposite
unforked
More examplesFewer examplesThese magnficent birds have a forked tail and a long, hooked bill.Water diviners claim to be able to find water with a forked tree branch.The clothes line was held up by a forked stick.The fish's tail has elongated filaments, giving a forked appearance.The tool has a forked end designed for cutting asparagus beneath the soil line.I found a forked bone like a wish-bone.
